titles.title: Children's Health Federal Trade Commission Authority Restoration Act
To restore the authority of the Federal Trade Commission to issue regulations on marketing and advertising to children.
Children's Health Federal Trade Commission Authority Restoration Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary: Children's Health Federal Trade Commission Authority Restoration Act - Repeals Federal Trade Commission Act provisions denying the FTC authority to promulgate any rule in children's advertising proceedings on the basis of a determination that such advertising constitutes an unfair act or practice in or affecting commerce.
